title: Don's Cocktail Sauce
directions: Stir ketchup, chili sauce, lemon juice, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl until smooth.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish, or to taste
12 drops hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco)
